benchmark_details.name: SMART PLAY: A BENCHMARK FOR LLMS AS INTELLIGENT AGENTS
benchmark_details.overview: SmartPlay is a challenging benchmark and methodology for evaluating LLMs as agents, consisting of 6 different games that test various capabilities such as reasoning, planning, and spatial understanding.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a systematic benchmark for evaluating the capabilities of LLMs as intelligent agents.

data.source: Games developed for SmartPlay, including Two-armed Bandits, Rock Paper Scissors, Tower of Hanoi, Messenger, Crafter, and Minecraft.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the number of actions taken, successful game completions, and overall scores achieved during gameplay.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores are indicative of better performance in game completion and action optimization.
methodology.validation: Evaluation conducted using multiple rounds of gameplay across several LLMs.
